titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the appointment of Ulysses S. Grant to the grade of General of the Armies of the United States.
Ulysses S. Grant Bicentennial Recognition Act
Ulysses S. Grant Bicentennial Recognition Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Ulysses S. Grant Bicentennial Recognition Act
This joint resolution authorizes the President to posthumously appoint Ulysses S. Grant to the grade of General of the Armies of the United States, effective on April 27, 2022.
